Counter.Name: InstructionsRetired
Counter.Description: This event counts the number of instructions at retirement.

Counter.Name: NonHaltedCycles
Counter.Description: This event counts core clock cycles whenever the clock signal on the specific core is running (not halted).

Counter.Name: L2References
Counter.Description: This event counts each request originating from the core to reference a cache line in the L2 level cache.

Counter.Name: L2Misses
Counter.Description: This event counts each cache miss condition for references to the L2 level cache.

Counter.Name: ITLBMisses
Counter.Description: This event counts misses in the Instruction Translation Lookaside Buffer (ITLB).

Counter.Name: BranchesRetired
Counter.Description: This event counts branch instructions at retirement.

Counter.Name: MispredictedBranches
Counter.Description: This event counts mispredicted branch instructions at retirement.
